channel.title: Movie on Blog Today
channel.description: Recent content in Movie on Blog Today

item.title: Oscar
item.description: “Political correctness” was quietly discussed at the time of the victory of “Everything Everywhere All at Once”. This view arose early when Moonlight Boy won the award that year; after all, it was another hard look at the rise of minorities. Some people say that “political correctness” is the biggest source of antipathy for hypocrisy - a polite and friendly way to give way to smiling may follow the social identity of “good citizens,” as to the extent to which this act of kindness is due to “you” is hard to know.
